response.original_title: The Other Side of Bruno Mars
response.overview: Bruno Mars found success initially as a songwriter for other popular artists such as Alexandra Burke, Travie McCoy, Adam Levine, Brandy, Sean Kingston, and Flo Rida. However his ultimate dream was to be a great preformer. Mars eventually realized his dream and signed as a solo artist with Atlantic Records. This documentary goes behind the music and explores The Other Side of Bruno Mars.
response.title: The Other Side of Bruno Mars
